features: SILVA Intelligent Light - A light beam technology that optimizes the light pattern; giving less head movements, better control and improved balance by combining long reach spot light and close flood light
Night vision and map reading modes - In addition to white light, the headlamp has a red light mode that preserves your night vision and an orange mode that is optimal for map reading
Flexible attachment options - The headband and a helmet attachment/belt clip give you multiple attachment options based on individual preferences
Lightweight fit - Comfortable fit thanks to low weight and wide anti-slip headband
Super-low mode (10 lm) - Saves battery, perfect for reading
Long burn time - The headlamp is powered by a 3xAAA batteries
Battery level indicator - Informs about the remaining charge level when the headlamp is turned off
Fully waterproof - Meets the IPX7 standard; can be submerged in water for up to 30 minutes at a depth of 1 meter
Use as tent light - Get a soft glowing light by placing the lamp inside the storage bag
Smooth buckles for smooth adjustment of the headband
